original_title: No More to Say & Nothing to Weep For: An Elegy for Allen Ginsberg
overview: Witness the last days of the Beat poet whose works would capture the very essence of the 1960 counter-cultural movement in an informative documentary featuring Allan Ginsburg's final television interview as well as remarkable deathbed footage shot by underground cinema icon Jonas Mekas.
title: No More to Say & Nothing to Weep For: An Elegy for Allen Ginsberg
